reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are incredibly engaging. She explains complex concepts with clarity and enthusiasm.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen is knowledgeable, but his assignments can be quite challenging. Office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's passion for biology is contagious. Her labs are well-organized and interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson knows his subject well, but his lectures can be dry at times. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel creates a supportive learning environment. Her research projects are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson moves too quickly through difficult concepts. More practice problems would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's experiments are fascinating. She's always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's analysis of texts is insightful. Discussions in class are lively and engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia assigns interesting readings, but her lectures can be somewhat disorganized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wright makes economics accessible and relevant. His real-world examples are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's passion for art is evident. Her slide presentations are well-curated and informative.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov's lectures are often confusing. The workload is excessive for an introductory course.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez organizes great field trips. Her exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor encourages critical thinking, but sometimes goes off on tangents during lectures.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's enthusiasm for language is infectious. Her interactive teaching style is very effective.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Murphy has industry experience, but his grading can be inconsistent. Group projects are valuable.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen explains complex brain functions clearly. Her research opportunities for students are excellent.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Adams is a skilled musician and teacher. The ear training exercises are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. White's lectures are fascinating. The course readings can be dense, but are well-chosen.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's projects are interesting, but his explanations of concepts are often unclear.
